1.description: The text resizing to 200% has caused horizontal scrolling due to overlapping elements, but the header menu elements are still accessible without overlap.
1.prompt: keep it short and succinct: if my resizing of the text to 200% within the browser has caused any of the content, including text, images, or any other important web element to overlap or require the user to scroll laterally to view the rest of the content.
